summary: A young boy living in the near future looks for an escape from a home with arguing parents. As a way to cope with the recent arguments from his parents he receives a robot companion that he ends up abusing.
cast: Max Records|Jenni Fontana|James Nardini|Joe Childs|Ruairi Robinson|Caroline Rich|Corbin Timbrook|Benny Shelton|Melissa Lee|Skoti Collins|Antal Kalik
title: BlinkyTM
